page.title: 07FARMING,FRECKLETON FARMER.
page.content: Mr.Carter runs the farm with his son called Alan.He has 64 acres of grass on he farm and has 52 Freesian cows(black and white ones)Each year there are about 52 calves born to the cows.When went we saw three of the calves one was two days old and walking(it's value &8)Then Mr.Carter let it's mother into the yard.After that he showed us the other two calves which were 14 days old.His E.E.C. quota is 244,000 litres.Mr.Carter dosn't like being a member of the E.E.C. he had more freedom before we joined.Now he is directed what he must grow and his exact yeild.He is penilized for being too successful in producing milk.The grass is grown for winter food for his cattle.He mows his grass twice a year,raking and collecting it to store.
